name: Dangerous Skies 80's edition
description:
Enter the world of Dangerous skies, a shoot em up inspired by the mythical space invaders, you will face ten fantastic levels in full 80s style.You will have to fight the alien invasion and free the planet from their threat. During the missions you will come into possession of upgrades to increase firepower. If you miss the eighties this is the game for you.

Key Features

* eliminates the alien invasion and saves the planet earth

* establish your score record

* unlock the extra skins of your spaceship

* relive an 80 years atmosphere

* discover the upgrades of your weapons

* face fearsome bosses
